    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3370</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Family</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογένεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Familia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A presentation of a student teacher Training Project of English lessons in a class with children who have Cerebral Palsy</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">projects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teacher training</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cerbral Palsy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Darstellung eines Kursteilnehmerausbildung- 
der Lehrerprojektes der englischen Lektionen in einer Kategorie mit 
Kindern, die zerebrale Lähmung haben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation d'un projet de formation de 
professeur d'étudiant des leçons anglaises dans une classe avec les 
enfants qui ont la paralysie cérébrale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação de um projeto do treinamento 
de professor do estudante de lições inglesas em uma classe com 
crianças que têm o palsy cerebral</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione di un progetto di addestramento
di insegnante dell'allievo delle lezioni inglesi in un codice 
categoria con i bambini che hanno paralisi cerebrale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρουσίαση ενός προγράμματος κατάρτισης 
εκπαιδευτικών σπουδαστών των αγγλικών μαθημάτων σε μια κλάση με 
τα παιδιά που έχουν την εγκεφαλική παράλυση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación de un proyecto del 
entrenamiento de profesor del estudiante de lecciones inglesas en una 
clase con los niños que tienen parálisis cerebral</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekte</string>
